author: Joe Schofield
description: Take a Rob Roy and switch some of the sweet vermouth for rich flavoursome PX sherry, add a dash or three of orange bitters and you've a William Wallace. A well-conceived cocktail that if you nail the dilution (hence the optional chilled water) is both spirituous and quaffable. Be warned!
name: William Wallace

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
